metadata.description: Smart quotes vs straight quotes mismatch

original:
# Configuration for the “main” service
SERVICE_NAME = “main-api”
SERVICE_PORT = 8080

llm_edit.old_text:
# Configuration for the "main" service
SERVICE_NAME = "main-api"
SERVICE_PORT = 8080
llm_edit.new_text:
# Configuration for the "main" service
SERVICE_NAME = "main-api"
SERVICE_PORT = 9090
SERVICE_HOST = "0.0.0.0"

expected:
# Configuration for the “main” service
SERVICE_NAME = “main-api”
SERVICE_PORT = 9090
SERVICE_HOST = "0.0.0.0"
